name: Nights At Jurassic Island Survival
description:
Something terrible happened and all the dinosaurs escaped from the park on the island. The military has not arrived yet, but you must stay alive at all costs!
Your main goal - to survive on a lost dinosaur island.

*** HOW TO PLAY ***
- Beware dinosaurs attacks
- Use weapons to protect yourself
- Use cameras for watching
- Close doors - you can close only one door
- The time is displayed at the top of the screen. Try to survive more than 5 nigths!

Nights At Jurassic Island Survival game features:
- survival game
- dinosaur hunting
- base defend
- cool visual effects
- nights simulator
